title: Patient Care Practical Competency Enhancement: Peer Learning-Based Vaccination Program Education Effectiveness Improvement Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of vaccination program operations and foundational instructional design skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can derive three improvement strategies for vaccination education program design through collaborative problem-solving with peers.
Learners can develop one practical educational solution applicable to real-world settings using network-based problem-solving strategies.
Learners can concretely plan and present their solution implementation plans through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
